data.author: Manu Bhardwaj
data.title: Chasing Fire
data.content:
It’s like chasing fire,
When I’m dreaming of you.
We’re tied together like roses
I’m just a rose full of thorns afraid of hurting you.

It’s like chasing fire,
When I’m running after you.
Swivelling around, afraid to touch
Yet dying to get closer to you.
